item.name: Crossbow, Light (UA)
item.text: Mastery (Slow, Prerequisite: None): If you hit a creature with this weapon and deal damage to the creature, you can reduce its Speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn. If you hit the creature more than once with this property, the Speed reduction doesn't exceed 10 feet.
Source: Unearthed Arcana: Player's Handbook Playtest 8 p. 21
